official-title.#text:
To direct the Chief Information Officer of the Department of Veterans Affairs and the Deputy Under
			 Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Economic Opportunity to submit to the
			 Committees on Veterans’ Affairs of the Senate and House of Representatives
			 a report regarding the information technology of the Department that is
			 used in administering the educational benefits administered by the
			 Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
